item.description:
Have you been drooling over Dancing with the Stars, when they dance Cha-Cha-Cha and Salsa/Mambo? Come learn Salsa, and of course, stay to Dance.

Every Thursday @ Club Caribe
Salsa lesson @ 9pm
777 Memorial Drive, Cambridge

Courtyard Marriott hotel. Friendly crowd (easy to meet people, no snobbery here), all ages, no sports attire
Complimentary parking and appetizers :)

Cover is $12. there will be a costume party on October 28, and an amateur dance competition tonight.
item.name: SALSA DANCING!!!
